decision_conditions: The application seeks approval of the details required by Condition 44 (Flood Resistant Measures) of planning permission 22/02905/FUL. Condition 5 was requested by the Environment Agency (EA) and requires details of flood resistance measures to be submitted prior to occupation to reduce the risk of flooding to the proposed development and future users.The applicant has submitted a document with flood resistance measures prepared by Darling Associates Architects (dated July 2024). The EA has reviewed this document and does not recommend Condition 44 is discharged as active rather than passive resistance measures have been proposed, as required by the condition.  Passive flood resistance measures require no human intervention or power source to be implemented. Active flood resistance measures require human intervention to be deployed. The EA has recommended two potential options for overcoming their objection which is publicly available on Council's website. Officers recommend this advice is thoroughly reviewed prior to any future application being submitted to discharge Condition 44. Officers conclude the details submitted to discharge Condition 44 (Flood Resistant Measures) of planning permission 22/02905/FUL are unacceptable.
description: Details required for Condition 44 (flood resistance measures) of planning permission 22/02905/FUL (Application under S73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with condition 1 (Approved plans) of planning permission ref: 20/02495/FUL (Full planning application for the demolition of Surrey House, Multi Storey Car Park, Hippodrome and Bo Concept and the erection of 2(two) Office buildings [Use Class - E(g)(i)] Building A and Building B: Building A 9 storeys (22,144 (GEA) sqms) Building B 11 storeys (11,587 (GEA) sqms). The erection of a replacement multi storey car park of 354 spaces plus cycle parking (for use as a public car park at weekends) landscaping, public realm upgrades, servicing, pedestrian and vehicular access. This application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement) dated 02/12/2021. Variation to consist of revisions to the Car Park (Building C))
